name: Header UI Theme Toggle

movements.name: Toggle Theme

beats.title: Toggle Theme
beats.scenario: Switch Between Light and Dark Theme
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the current theme
When toggleTheme is invoked
Then theme switches to opposite value within 50ms
And new preference is saved to localStorage
And 'theme:changed' event is published

Given animation requirements
When theme toggles
Then CSS transitions are applied smoothly
And no layout shift occurs (CLS < 0.1)
And visual change appears within 100ms total

Given DOM elements with theme-dependent styling
When toggleTheme executes
Then all styled elements update immediately
And CSS variables are recalculated
And no flickering or flashing occurs

Given accessibility requirements
When theme changes
Then color contrast remains >= 4.5:1 for all text
And prefers-color-scheme media query is respected
And system respects 'no-preference' setting

Given performance budget
When toggleTheme completes
Then theme switch completes within 100ms
And no frame drops occur (maintain 60fps)
And memory usage stays within baseline (no leaks)
beats.userStory: As a user, I want theme switching to complete in <100ms so that dark mode activation feels instantaneous (target: imperceptible transition < 1 frame at 60fps).

movements.userStory: As a user, I want theme switching to complete in <100ms so that dark mode activation feels instantaneous (target: imperceptible transition < 1 frame at 60fps).
movements.businessValue: Improves user satisfaction; reduces eye strain with dark mode (user preference > 40%); enables accessible experience
